trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows list view control, which displays a collection of items that can be displayed using one of four different views.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en Windows listen visningskontroll, som viser en samling med elementer som kan vises ved hjelp av én av fire visninger.

trans-unit.source: A ListView control allows you to display a list of items with item text and, optionally, an icon to identify the type of item.
trans-unit.target: En listevisningen blir kontroll lar deg vise en liste over elementer Elementtekst, og eventuelt et ikon til å identifisere elementtypen.

trans-unit.source: For example, the Windows Explorer list of files is similar in appearance to a ListView control.
trans-unit.target: Det er for eksempel ligner på en listevisningen blir kontroll filliste Windows Utforsker.

trans-unit.source: It displays a list of the files and folders currently selected in the tree.
trans-unit.target: Det vises en liste over filene og mappene som er valgt i treet.

trans-unit.source: Each file and folder displays an icon associated with it to help identify the type of file or folder.
trans-unit.target: Hver fil- og viser et ikon som er knyttet til den til å identifisere av filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class represents an item within a ListView control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>klassen representerer et element i en listevisningen blir-kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: The items that are displayed in the list can be shown in one of five different views.
trans-unit.target: Elementene som skal vises i listen kan vises i fem ulike visninger.

trans-unit.source: Items can be displayed as large icons, as small icons, or as small icons in a vertical list.
trans-unit.target: Kan vise elementer som store ikoner som små ikoner eller som små ikoner i en loddrett liste.

trans-unit.source: Items can also have subitems which contain information that is related to the parent item.
trans-unit.target: Elementer kan også ha underelementene som inneholder informasjon som er knyttet til det overordnede elementet.

trans-unit.source: The details view allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that identify the information being displayed in a subitem.
trans-unit.target: Detaljvisningen lar deg vise elementet og tilhørende underelementene i et rutenett med kolonneoverskrifter som identifiserer informasjonen som vises i en subitem.

trans-unit.source: The tile view, which has limited availability as described below, allows you to display the item and its subitems as a tile that contains a large icon next to the textual information.
trans-unit.target: Side ved side-visningen som er begrenset tilgjengelighet som beskrevet nedenfor, kan du vise elementet og tilhørende underelementene som en flis som inneholder en stor ikonet ved siden av samme.

trans-unit.source: ListView supports single or multiple selection.
trans-unit.target: Listevisningen blir støtter ett eller flere valg.

trans-unit.source: The multiple selection feature lets the user select from a list of items in a way similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Flere utvalg funksjonen lar brukeren velge fra en liste med elementer på samme måte som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the user can activate selected items to perform a task.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan i tillegg aktivere valgte elementer for å utføre en oppgave.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could use a ListView control to display a list of files that the application can then open and utilize.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke en kontroll for listevisningen blir til å vise en liste over filer som programmet kan deretter åpne og bruke.

trans-unit.source: The user can select the files to open and then double-click them to activate the items and open the files in the application.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan velge filer å åpne og dobbeltklikk deretter dem for å aktivere elementene, og åpne filene i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The ListView can also display check boxes, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property, to allow the user to check the items that they want to perform an action on.
trans-unit.target: Den listevisningen blir kan også vise alternativene, ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>egenskapen som tillater brukeren å kontrollere elementer som de vil utføre en handling på.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ListView control in a variety of ways.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke listevisningen blir kontrollen i en rekke måter.

trans-unit.source: The control can be used to display information from an application, a database, or a text file.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen kan brukes til å vise informasjon fra et program, en database eller en tekstfil.

trans-unit.source: The ListView can also be used to obtain information from the user, such as selecting a set of files to process.
trans-unit.target: Den listevisningen blir kan også brukes til å hente informasjon fra brukeren, for eksempel velge et sett med filer til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: ListView provides a large number of properties that provide flexibility in appearance and behavior.
trans-unit.target: Listevisningen blir inneholder et stort antall egenskaper som gir fleksibilitet utseendet og virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property allows you to change the way in which items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen kan du endre måten elementene vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> properties allow you to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects that contain the images displayed for items and, in the case of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>, the check boxes that are displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>Egenskaper kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objekter som inneholder bilder som vises for elementer, og med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>, alternativene som vises når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are checked, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: For å fastslå hvilke elementer som er merket, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>til å få tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> property allows access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>, which stores the column headers that are displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>egenskapen tillater tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>, som lagrer kolonneoverskriftene som vises når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>kontrollen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Items are added and removed from the ListView through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Elementer er lagt til og fjernet fra listevisningen blir via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property allows you to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of the control, which provides methods for manipulating the items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>egenskapen får du tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>kontrollens, som inneholder metoder for å endre elementene i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to allow the user to edit the text of an item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil Tillat brukeren å redigere teksten for et element, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your control contains a large number of items, it is often easier for the user to see them in a sorted list.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen inneholder et stort antall elementer, er det ofte enklere for brukeren som skal vises i en sortert liste.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A> property to sort the items alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>til å sortere elementene alfabetisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also completely customize the appearance of a ListView control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilpasse utseendet til en listevisningen blir-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property to `true` and handle one or more of the following events: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>egenskapen `true` og håndtere én eller flere av følgende hendelser: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: Many of the properties of the ListView control are used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Mange av egenskapene kontrollens listevisningen blir brukt når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>kontrollen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> property allows the user of your ListView control to reconfigure the order of columns at run time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A>egenskapen lar brukeren for listevisningen blir kontrollen konfigurere rekkefølge for kolonner på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> property allows an item and its subitems to be selected instead of just the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>egenskapen tillater et element, og underelementene velges i stedet bare elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: To display gridlines in the details view to identify the boundaries of items and subitems in the ListView, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise rutenettlinjene i detaljvisningen til å identifisere grensene for elementer og underelementer i listevisningen., kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HeaderStyle%2A> property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HeaderStyle%2A>egenskapen kan du angi hvilken type kolonneoverskriftene skal vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ListView control can operate in virtual mode, where <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects are generated dynamically instead of being stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: En listevisningen blir kontroll kan brukes i virtuelle modus, der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objekter genereres dynamisk i stedet for å lagres i det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful for dealing with very large lists or lists whose contents frequently change.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig for håndtering av svært lister eller lister med innholdet ofte endre.

trans-unit.source: To enable Virtual mode, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere virtuelle modus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true` og håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the many properties that are available for a ListView control, there are methods and events that your application can use to provide additional capabilities to the ListView.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til mange egenskaper som er tilgjengelige for listevisningen blir kontroller, er det metoder og hendelser programmet kan bruke til å angi flere muligheter til den listevisningen blir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> methods allow you to improve performance when you add many items to a ListView by preventing the control from repainting every time that an item is added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>metoder gjør det mulig å forbedre ytelsen når du legger til mange elementer en listevisningen blir ved å hindre at kontrollen oppdatering hver gang en elementet er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your ListView control is displaying items and subitems, you may want to provide functionality when the user right-clicks a subitem.
trans-unit.target: Hvis listevisningen blir kontrollen viser elementer og underelementer, bør du angi funksjonalitet når brukeren høyreklikker en subitem.

trans-unit.source: To determine the item whose subitem is being clicked, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne elementet som subitem klikkes, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemAt%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: When performing validation of the items after the user has edited them, you may want to display a specific item to the user to change.
trans-unit.target: Når du utfører validering av elementene etter at brukeren har redigeres dem, kan du vil vises for brukeren å endre et spesifikt element.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A> method can be called to ensure that the specific item is in the visible area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>metoder kan kalles for å sikre at elementet er i området synlige i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property set to `true`, you can perform tasks such as validating the text being edited before and after the text changed by creating an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>-egenskapen satt til `true`, kan du utføre oppgaver som validering teksten redigeres før og etter tekst ved å opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform tasks such as opening a file or displaying a dialog box to edit an item displayed in a ListView, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utføre oppgaver som åpner en fil eller vises en dialogboks der du redigerer et element vises i en listevisningen blir, kan du opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>

trans-unit.source: If you allow the user to sort the items in a ListView when they click a column header, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event to perform the sorting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tillater brukeren å sortere elementene i en listevisningen blir når de klikker en kolonneoverskrift, kan du opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>-hendelsen for å utføre sorteringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, you can determine when a change in an item's check state has occurred by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>er satt til `true`, kan du bestemme når en endring i et element av tilstanden oppstod ved behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also set a background image for the ListView with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi et bakgrunnsbilde for listevisning med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Your application must have the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> on its `Main` method to correctly display the background image for the ListView control.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må ha den <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>på den `Main` metode for å vise riktig bakgrunnsbildet for listevisningen blir-kontroll.</xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if a ListView control with a background image is hosted in Internet Explorer, specify comctl32.dll version 6.0 as a dependent assembly in the application manifest file to ensure the background image is property displayed.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg hvis en listevisningen blir kontroll med et bakgrunnsbilde er plassert i Internet Explorer, angi comctl32.dll versjon 6.0 en avhengige samlingen i manifestfilen programmet til å sikre bakgrunnsbildet er egenskapen vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property for a ListView control has no affect on the appearance of the cursor in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versions 1.1 and earlier.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innstillingen det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskapen for listevisningen blir kontroller har ingen innvirkning på utseendet på markøren i [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versjon 1.1 og tidligere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 provide three features that enhance the ListView control when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method: tile view, grouping, and the insertion mark.
trans-unit.target: Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 gir tre funksjoner som kan forbedre den listevisningen blir kontrollere når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden: side ved side visning, gruppering og Merk for innsetting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The tile view lets you balance graphical and textual information by displaying item and subitem text next to large icons.
trans-unit.target: Kan du saldo for grafisk og tekstbaserte ved å vise elementet og subitem tekst ved siden av store ikoner side ved side-visningen.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> to enable this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>å aktivere dette problemet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The grouping feature lets you visually group items into related categories.
trans-unit.target: Grupperingsfunksjonen kan du gruppere visuelt elementer i relaterte kategorier.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> objects to the ListView control when you want to enable this feature.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>til å legge til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>objekter i den listevisningen blir kontrollere når du vil aktivere denne funksjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>

trans-unit.source: To temporarily disable the feature, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere funksjonen, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The insertion mark feature lets you provide drag-and-drop item repositioning with visual feedback to indicate drop locations.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen innsetting merke lar deg angi dra og slipp elementet flytte visuell tilbakemelding om å angi Slett plasseringer.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> object retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark%2A> property to display the insertion mark.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>objektet hentet via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark%2A>til å vise innsetting Merk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>

trans-unit.source: These features are available only under Windows XP and Windows Server 2003.
trans-unit.target: Disse funksjonene er tilgjengelig bare under Windows XP og Windows Server 2003.

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, the code that relate to these features has no effect, the tile view appears as the large icon view, and the insertion mark and groups do not display.
trans-unit.target: Koden som er knyttet til disse funksjonene har ingen virkning på eldre operativsystemer, side ved side-visningen vises som store ikoner-visningen og innsettingsmerke og gruppene vises ikke.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, you might want to include code that determines whether these features are available, and provide alternate functionality when they are unavailable.
trans-unit.target: I noen tilfeller kan du vil ta med koden som angir om disse funksjonene er tilgjengelige, og angi alternative funksjonalitet når de er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: These features are provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: Disse funksjonene leveres av samme bibliotek med funksjonen for oppsett av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Undersøk tilgjengeligheten av dette biblioteket ved kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>overlasten for metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some of the ListView members and the views they are valid in.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser noen av listevisningen blir medlemmene og visningene er gyldig i.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of action the user must take to activate an item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir type handling brukeren må følge for å aktivere et element.

trans-unit.source: The Activation property allows you to specify how the user will activate an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen aktivering kan du angi hvordan brukeren aktivere et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Activating an item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> differs from just selecting an item.
trans-unit.target: Aktivering av et element i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>er forskjellig fra bare hvis du velger et element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When an item is activated, an action is typically performed in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: Når et element er aktivert, utføre en handling som vanligvis i en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>

trans-unit.source: For example, when an item is activated you might open a file or display a dialog box that allows the item to be edited.
trans-unit.target: Når et element er aktivert kan du for eksempel åpner en fil eller vises en dialogboks der elementet som skal redigeres.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an item is double-clicked by the user to activate it.
trans-unit.target: Et element er vanligvis dobbeltklikker av brukeren å aktivere den.

trans-unit.source: If the Activation property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, clicking the item one time activates it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis aktivering-egenskapen er angitt for å <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>klikke elementet én gang aktiverer det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Activation property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> differs from the standard double-click because the two clicks can have any duration between them.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen aktivering til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>er forskjellig fra standard Dobbeltklikk fordi to Klikk kan ha en varigheten mellom dem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the Activation property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis aktivering-egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, etiketten redigering tillates ikke uavhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"></xref> members.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"> </xref> medlemmer.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når etiketten for et element redigeres av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The AfterLabelEdit event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: AfterLabelEdit-hendelsen oppstår når brukeren er ferdig med å endre teksten for et element.

trans-unit.source: The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change.
trans-unit.target: Den nye strengen som brukeren skriver for elementet er sendt til hendelsen, og hendelsesbehandlingen kan forkaste endringen.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hendelsesbehandlingen avviser endringen, gjenopprettes teksten teksten slik den var før brukeren begynte å redigere elementet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the AfterLabelEdit event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi AfterLabelEdit hendelsen oppstår før etiketten endringer er utført, kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden i et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen vil sortere elementet ved hjelp av den opprinnelige verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In order for the AfterLabelEdit event to be raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For den AfterLabelEdit-hendelsen, at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen må settes til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> event to perform tasks before the user edits the text of an item.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>-hendelsen for å utføre oppgaver før brukeren redigerer teksten for et element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for elementer i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Alignment property only affects alignment when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen justering påvirker bare justering når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has no effect with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen har ingen effekt med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can drag column headers to reorder columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan dra kolonneoverskriftene for å endre rekkefølgen på kolonnene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Setting the value of the AllowColumnReorder property has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen AllowColumnReorder har ingen virkning hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to allow users to reposition columns in the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen slik at brukere kan flytte kolonner i kontrollen ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: When the AllowColumnReorder property is set to `true`, users can position the columns in the control to display the item and its subitems in a way that meets their needs within your application.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AllowColumnReorder er satt til `true`, kan brukere plassere kolonnene i kontrollen skal vises elementet og tilhørende underelementene på en måte som dekker deres behov i programmet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drag-and-drop column reordering is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis at dra og slipp kolonne er tillatt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Arranges items in the control when they are displayed as icons based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment*> property.
trans-unit.target: Ordner elementer i kontrollen når de vises som ikoner basert på verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>metoden er bare nyttig når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method arranges the items based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne versjonen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>metoden Ordner elementer som er basert på verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cause the items to be aligned based on a value that differs from that of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property, use the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Vil føre til at elementene skal justeres basert på en verdi som er forskjellig fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>egenskapen bruke versjonen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Arranges items in the control when they are displayed as icons with a specified alignment setting.
trans-unit.target: Ordner elementer i kontrollen når de vises som ikoner med en angitt justering-innstilling.

trans-unit.source: The ArrangeIcons method is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ArrangeIcons er bare nyttig når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: This version of the ArrangeIcons method arranges the icons in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment> value specified in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne versjonen av metoden ArrangeIcons ordner ikonene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment>verdien angitt i den `value` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method does not change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden ikke endre verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>-egenskapen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is used to arrange icons on the control using a different value than that of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å ordne ikonene på kontrollen ved hjelp av en annen verdi enn den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cause the items to be aligned based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property, use the other version of the ArrangeIcons method.
trans-unit.target: Vil føre til at elementene skal justeres basert på verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>egenskapen bruke versjonen av metoden ArrangeIcons.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the value parameter is not a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i den value parameteren er ikke medlem av den opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether icons are automatically kept arranged.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om ikonene holdes automatisk ordnet.

trans-unit.source: The AutoArrange property only arranges items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Ordne automatisk ordner bare elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To change the alignment of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Endre justering av elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoArrange to ensure that all items in your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control are automatically arranged to avoid overlapping at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke Ordne automatisk for å sikre at alle elementer i din <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen ordnes automatisk å unngå overlappende på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if icons are automatically kept arranged and snapped to the grid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ikonene holdes automatisk ordnet og ødelagt som rutenett. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the given column as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: Endrer størrelse bredden på den angitte kolonnen som indikert av resize-stil.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> column headers and columns are populated with items.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden virker bare én gang i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>og som inneholder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>har blitt laget, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kolonneoverskrifter og kolonner blir fylt ut med elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the columns will not resize unless AutoResizeColumn is called again.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nye elementer legges til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, kolonnene heller ikke størrelsen på hvis AutoResizeColumn kalles på nytt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for kolonnen skal endre størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is greater than 0 when is -or- columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns set.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer større enn 0 når er - eller - columnIndex er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet kolonner angitt.

trans-unit.source: headerAutoResize is not a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: headerAutoResizeer ikke medlem av den opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the columns as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: Endrer størrelse bredden på kolonnene som indikert av resize-stil.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> column headers and columns are populated with items.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden virker bare én gang i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>og som inneholder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>har blitt laget, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kolonneoverskrifter og kolonner blir fylt ut med elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the columns will not resize unless AutoResizeColumns is called again.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nye elementer legges til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, kolonnene heller ikke størrelsen på hvis AutoResizeColumns kalles på nytt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn*> is called with a value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> is not set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> kalles med en verdi enn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> når <> </> *> ikke er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the background.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> i bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect on the layout of the background image of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på oppsettet for bakgrunnsbildet for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll, derfor ikke vises i designer eller IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background image of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> should be tiled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bakgrunnsbildet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> må være side ved side.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundImageTiled property returns `false` if an image is not set.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer BackgroundImageTiled `false` Hvis et bilde som ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the background image of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> should be tiled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis bakgrunnsbildet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> skal side ved side; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren starter redigering etiketten for et element.

trans-unit.source: The BeforeLabelEdit event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: BeforeLabelEdit-hendelsen oppstår når brukeren starter endring teksten for et element.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot edit the text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hendelsesbehandlingen avbryter denne hendelsen, kan brukeren redigere teksten.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å hindre at brukeren redigerer bestemte elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, the BeforeLabelEdit event is not raised; all user attempts to edit item labels are automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er satt til `false`, BeforeLabelEdit-hendelsen oppstår ikke; alle bruker forsøk på å redigere elementetiketter automatisk er avvist.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Prevents the control from drawing until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen hindrer tegning før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate*>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: Den beste måten å legge til flere elementer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>er å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>(tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan legge til en matrise av elementene i listen i én enkelt operasjon.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class, you can use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> every time that an item is added.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil legge til elementer en etter en tid som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>klasse, kan du bruke metoden BeginUpdate til å hindre at kontrollen oppdatering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>hver gang en elementet er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fullført arbeidsoppgaven for å legge til elementer i kontrollen, kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>metode for å aktivere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>skal oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> when lots of items are being added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne måten å legge til elementer kan forhindre at flickered tegning av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>når mange elementer som legges til i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If BeginUpdate is called more than once, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> must be called an equivalent number of times.
trans-unit.target: Hvis BeginUpdate kalles mer enn én gang <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>må kalles et tilsvarende antall ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Until the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> will not repaint.
trans-unit.target: Før forrige kall til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>vil ikke oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other than this, multiple calls to BeginUpdate have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Flere kall til BeginUpdate har ingen virkning enn dette.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use the BorderStyle property to change the border style of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to match the border style settings of other controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen BorderStyle til å endre kantlinjestilen på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>tilgangskontroll til som samsvarer med kantlinje stilen for andre kontroller i skjemaet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if none of the other controls on your form displays a border, you can set the BorderStyle property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> to match the other controls.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen av de andre kontrollene i skjemaet viser en kantlinje, kan du for eksempel angi egenskapen BorderStyle for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>styre til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>som samsvarer med de andre kontrollene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the display area for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> in virtual mode has changed, and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> determines that a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når innholdet i visningsområdet for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> virtuelle modusen er endret, og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> bestemmer at et nytt område med elementer som er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: This event only occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår bare når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling this event allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to update the item information held in the cache so that it is readily available.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av denne hendelsen gjør den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>å oppdatere informasjonen elementet beholdes i hurtigbufferen slik at den er tilgjengelige.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This can improve performance on large lists, or lists whose items are expensive to calculate.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan forbedre ytelsen på store lister eller lister med elementer som kostbar til å beregne.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box appears next to each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en avmerkingsboks vises ved siden av hvert element i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxes property allows you to display a check box next to each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen avmerkingsboksene lar deg vise en avmerkingsboks ved siden av hvert element i listen.

trans-unit.source: This enables your application to display a list of items (and subitems if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`) that the user can select by clicking the check box.
trans-unit.target: Dette aktiverer programmet til å vise en liste med elementer (og subitems hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til `View.Details`) at brukeren kan velge ved å klikke i avmerkingsboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxes property offers a way to select multiple items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control without using the CTRL key.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen avmerkingsboksene tilbyr en måte å velge flere elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen uten å bruke CTRL-tasten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on your application, using check boxes to select items rather than the standard multiple selection method may be easier for the user.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av programmet kanskje ved hjelp av i avmerkingsboksene velge elementer i stedet for standard flere utvalg metoden enklere for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Even if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, you can still display checkboxes and provide multiple selection capabilities to the user.
trans-unit.target: Selv om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er satt til `false`, du kan fortsatt vise avmerkingsboksene og gi flere utvalg funksjoner til brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: This feature can be useful if you do not want multiple items to be selected yet still want to allow the user to choose multiple items from the list to perform an operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen kan være nyttig hvis du ikke ønsker flere elementer som skal velges enda fremdeles vil Tillat brukeren å velge flere elementer fra listen for å utføre en operasjon i programmet.

trans-unit.source: To determine when an item has been checked, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut når et element er sjekket, oppretter du en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: To get all the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Ikke hente alle elementene som er sjekket inn den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>til å få tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To get the indexes of all items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å hente indeksene i alle elementer som er sjekket inn av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> are displayed instead of the check box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>egenskapen, bilder ved indeks posisjoner 0 og 1 i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>vises i stedet for i avmerkingsboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.
trans-unit.target: Bildet i indeksen posisjon 0 vises i stedet for merket for ukontrollert, og bildet i indeksen posisjon 1 vises i stedet for de avmerkede merkingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set this property to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du setter denne egenskapen til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>inntreffer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: > > Check boxes are not displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: >> Avmerkingsboksene er ikke vises når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a check box appears next to each item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en avmerkingsboks vises ved siden av hvert element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the indexes of the currently checked items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksene i øyeblikket avmerkede elementene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er bare nyttig når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedIndices property returns a collection that contains the index positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of all items that are checked in the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CheckedIndices returnerer en samling som inneholder posisjonen indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>for alle elementer som er merket i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan elementene i samlingen, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the index positions of the items that are checked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente en samling av elementene som er sjekket inn av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll, i stedet for indeksen posisjoner for elementer som er merket, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> that contains the indexes of the currently checked items.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>som inneholder indeksene i gjeldende merkede elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently checked, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen elementer er sjekket, et tomt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently checked items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter de for øyeblikket avmerkede elementene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er bare nyttig når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedItems property returns a collection that contains all items that are checked in the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CheckedItems returnerer en samling som inneholder alle elementer som er merket i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan elementene i samlingen, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the index positions within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the items that are checked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente en samling av posisjonene indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>for elementer som er merket i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen i stedet for elementer som er merket, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection> that contains the currently checked items.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>som inneholder elementer som for øyeblikket avmerkede.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently checked, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen elementer er sjekket, et tomt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes all items and columns from the control.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle elementer og kolonner fra kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove all items and columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control without having to call the individual `Clear` methods from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> classes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å fjerne alle elementene og kolonner fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen uten å kalle individuelle `Clear` metoder fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Clear method does not clear <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For Fjern metoden fjerner ikke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>

trans-unit.source: To clear <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the list view control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker en kolonneoverskrift i kontrollen for visningen.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnClick event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: ColumnClick hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en av kolonneoverskriftene i detaljvisningen elementene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen (når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The ColumnClick event is typically handled to sort the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> using the clicked column as the column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: ColumnClick-hendelsen behandles vanligvis hvis du vil sortere elementene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>bruker klikket kolonnen som kolonnen skal sorteres etter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column header order is changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når overskriften kolonnerekkefølgen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnReordered event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen ColumnReordered er en kan annulleres hendelse og kan avbrytes ved behandling av hendelsen, og sette den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid, hvis hendelsen blir avbrutt, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs>, endres ikke til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>
