trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all column headers that appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av alle kolonneoverskrifter som vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Columns property returns a collection that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen kolonner returnerer en samling som inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objekter som vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects define the columns that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objekter Definer kolonnene som vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne som brukes til å vise subitem informasjon for hvert element i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan elementene i samlingen, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any items.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis din <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen ikke har noen kolonneoverskrifter som er angitt, og du har angitt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen vises ikke alle elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> that represents the column headers that appear when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>som representerer kolonneoverskriftene som vises når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the width of a column is successfully changed.

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke hvis kolonnen bredden endringen er avbrutt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging>hendelsen For mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to check the new column width with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, and cancel the event if you choose by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A> method when the component is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A>metoden når komponenten ikke trengs lenger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method removes the component from its container (if the component has a site) and triggers the dispose event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner komponenten fra beholderen (Hvis komponenten har et område) og hendelsen avhending.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frigi ressurser både administrerte og uforvaltede; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal tegne overflaten ved hjelp av en sekundær buffer til å redusere eller forby flimmer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis overflaten i kontrollen skal tegnes med doble bufring; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når viser detaljene for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> tegnes og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan du tilpasse utseendet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll med eieren tegning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event can occur for each column header in the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan oppstå for hver kolonne i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om eieren tegning, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>referanse andre datakilder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> tegnes og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan du tilpasse utseendet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll med eieren tegning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om eieren tegning av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>referanse andre datakilder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DrawItem event can occur for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> item.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen DrawItem kan oppstå for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> events also occur.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>hendelser også oppstå.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the DrawItem event to draw elements common to all items, such as the background, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du behandle DrawItem-hendelsen for å tegne elementer som er felles for alle elementer, for eksempel bakgrunnen, og behandler de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>-hendelsen for å tegne elementer for individuelle underelementene, for eksempel tekstverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tegne alle elementer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere med bare én av de to hendelsene, selv om dette kan være like praktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: For å tegne kolonneoverskriftene i detaljvisningen, må du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because of a bug in the underlying Win32 control, the DrawItem event occurs without accompanying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> events once per row in the details view when the mouse pointer moves over the row, causing anything painted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler to be painted over by a custom background drawn in a DrawItem event handler.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > På grunn av en feil i den underliggende Win32-kontrollen av DrawItem inntreffer uten medfølgende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>hendelser for hver rad i detaljvisningen når musepekeren flyttes over raden, fører til at noe males i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>hendelsesbehandlingen males av en egendefinert bakgrunn med en DrawItem hendelsesbehandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: See the example in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> reference topic for a workaround that invalidates each row when the extra event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se eksemplet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>referanse for en løsning som ugyldiggjøres hver rad når hendelsen ekstra inntreffer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: An alternative workaround is to put all your custom drawing code in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler and paint the background for the entire item (including subitems) only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: En alternativ løsning er å sette alle egendefinerte tegning koden en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>hendelsesbehandlingen og paint bakgrunnen for hele elementet (inkludert underelementene) bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdien er 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når viser detaljene for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> tegnes og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan du tilpasse utseendet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll med eieren tegning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om eieren tegning, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>referanse andre datakilder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Subitem informasjon vanligvis vises i side ved side-visningen som detaljene vise, men side ved side-visningen, må den tegnes i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The DrawSubItem event can occur for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> subitem.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen DrawSubItem kan oppstå for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the DrawSubItem event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>-hendelsen for å tegne elementer vanlige til alle underelementer, for eksempel bakgrunnen, og behandle DrawSubItem-hendelsen for å tegne elementer for individuelle underelementene, for eksempel tekstverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tegne alle elementer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere med bare én av de to hendelsene, selv om dette kan være like praktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: For å tegne kolonneoverskriftene i detaljvisningen, må du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DrawSubItem event does not occur for any subitems for which no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object has been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For DrawSubItem hendelsen oppstår ikke for alle underelementene for som Nei <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objektet har blitt lagt til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the first subitem of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den første subitem for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objektet representerer det overordnede elementet og vises i den første kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Resumes drawing of the list view control after drawing is suspended by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Fortsetter tegning av listen vise kontrollen etter tegning er deaktivert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: Den beste måten å legge til flere elementer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>er å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>(tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan legge til en matrise av elementene i listen i én enkelt operasjon.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> each time an item is added.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil legge til elementer en etter en tid som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>klasse, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>metode for å hindre at kontrollen for oppdatering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>hver gang en elementet er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fullført arbeidsoppgaven for å legge til elementer i kontrollen, kan du kalle metoden EndUpdate å aktivere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>skal oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> when a large number of items are being added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne måten å legge til elementer kan forhindre at flickered tegning av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>når et stort antall elementer som legges til i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> is called more than once, EndUpdate must be called an equivalent number of times.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>kalles mer enn én gang EndUpdate må kalles et tilsvarende antall ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Until the last call to EndUpdate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> will not repaint.
trans-unit.target: Før forrige kall til EndUpdate i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>vil ikke oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Other than this, multiple calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Flere enn dette-kall å <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified item is visible within the control, scrolling the contents of the control if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Sikrer at det angitte elementet er synlig i kontrollen, rulling innholdet i kontrollen om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden for å sikre at et spesifikt element er synlig i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When performing validation on the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you can call the EnsureVisible method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to allow the user to perform changes on the item.
trans-unit.target: Når du utfører validering på elementene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, kan du kalle metoden EnsureVisible for å sikre at et element som kan ikke validere vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen som tillater brukeren å utføre endringer på elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the item that you want to ensure is visible is located above the viewable region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, calling the EnsureVisible method will scroll the contents of the control until it is the first item in the viewable area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at elementet vises er plassert over synlige område på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll, kaller metoden EnsureVisible ruller innholdet i kontrollen før den er det første elementet i området kan vises i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the item is below the viewable region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, calling the EnsureVisible method will scroll the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control until the item is the last item in the viewable area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet er lavere enn det kan visbare området på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll, kaller metoden EnsureVisible ruller innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere til elementet har det siste elementet i området kan vises i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To determine if an item is located at the top of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut om et element finnes øverst på skjermen for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet til å bla til visningen.

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter første <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som begynner med den angitte tekstverdien.

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Søket skiller ikke mellom.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: Den `text` parameter kan angi en delstreng med ønsket samsvarende tekst.

trans-unit.source: In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller i tillegg må det første elementet som begynner med den angitte teksten.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to FindItemWithText passing `brack` as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>inneholder to elementer – det første elementet tekst som er angitt til "vinkelen parentes" og det andre elementet tekst satt til "hakeparentes" — et kall til FindItemWithText sende `brack` som parameteren returnerer elementet som inneholder teksten er "hakeparentes".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>metoden returnerer `null` Hvis listen er tom eller det finnes ingen samsvarende elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som begynner med den angitte tekstverdien.

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>, if indicated, that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter første <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>, hvis angitt, som begynner med den angitte tekstverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The search starts at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Søket starter på den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Søket skiller ikke mellom.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: Den `text` parameter kan angi en delstreng med ønsket samsvarende tekst.

trans-unit.source: In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller i tillegg må det første elementet som begynner med den angitte teksten.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> passing "brack" as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>inneholder to elementer – det første elementet tekst som er angitt til "vinkelen parentes" og det andre elementet tekst satt til "hakeparentes" — et kall til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>sende "brack" fordi parameteren returnerer elementet som inneholder teksten er "hakeparentes".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>metoden returnerer `null` Hvis listen er tom eller det finnes ingen samsvarende elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include subitems in the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere underelementene i søket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet som søket skal starte.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som begynner med den angitte tekstverdien.

trans-unit.source: startIndex is less 0 or more than the number items in the .
trans-unit.target: startIndexer mindre 0 eller mer enn de tall elementene i den .

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>, if indicated, that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter første <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>, hvis angitt, som begynner med den angitte tekstverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The search starts at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Søket starter på den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>metoden returnerer `null` Hvis listen er tom eller det finnes ingen samsvarende elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Søket skiller ikke mellom.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: Den `text` parameter kan angi en delstreng med ønsket samsvarende tekst.

trans-unit.source: This method will return the first item that starts with the specified text, unless `false` is passed in for `isPrefixSearch`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller det første elementet som begynner med den angitte teksten, hvis `false` er sendt for `isPrefixSearch`.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> passing "brack" as the search text will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>inneholder to elementer – det første elementet tekst som er angitt til "vinkelen parentes" og det andre elementet tekst satt til "hakeparentes" — et kall til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>sende "brack" som søketeksten returnerer elementet som inneholder teksten er "hakeparentes".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If `isPrefixSearch` is set to `false`, this call will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `isPrefixSearch` er satt til `false`, kallet tilbakestiller `null`.

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include subitems in the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere underelementene i søket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet som søket skal starte.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow partial matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>tillate delvise samsvar; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som begynner med den angitte tekstverdien.

trans-unit.source: startIndex is less than 0 or more than the number of items in the .
trans-unit.target: startIndexer mindre enn 0 eller mer enn antallet elementer i den .

trans-unit.source: Finds the next item from the given point, searching in the specified direction
trans-unit.target: Finner neste element fra det angitte tidspunktet søker i den angitte retningen

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method returns `null` if no item is found in the given direction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>metoden returnerer `null` Hvis det finnes ingen elementer i den angitte retningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifying the nearest item can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on, and will affect the results of FindNearestItem.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer nærmeste elementet kan variere avhengig av operativsystemet programmet kjører på, og vil påvirke resultatene av FindNearestItem.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The point at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: Punktet vil begynne å søke.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that is closest to the given point, searching in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som ligger nærmest angitte punkt, søker i den angitte retningen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> is set to a value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>er satt til en annen verdi enn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Finds the next item from the given x- and y-coordinates, searching in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Finner neste element fra den angitte x - og y-koordinatene, søker i den angitte retningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method returns `null` if no item is found in the given direction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>metoden returnerer `null` Hvis det finnes ingen elementer i den angitte retningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifying the nearest item can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on, and will affect the results of FindNearestItem.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer nærmeste elementet kan variere avhengig av operativsystemet programmet kjører på, og vil påvirke resultatene av FindNearestItem.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate for the point at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinat for punktet vil begynne å søke.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate for the point at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinat for punktet vil begynne å søke.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that is closest to the given coordinates, searching in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som ligger nærmest de angitte koordinatene søker i den angitte retningen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> is set to a value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>er satt til en annen verdi enn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item in the control that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir elementet i kontrollen som har fokus.

trans-unit.source: The FocusedItem property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> that represents the item currently displaying the focus rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer FocusedItem den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>som representerer elementet vises for øyeblikket Fokusrektangelet for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control has no directly editable areas other than the items it displays, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control has focus, an item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> displays the focus reticle around its item text.
trans-unit.target: Fordi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen har ingen direkte redigerbare områder enn elementer som vises, når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen har fokus, et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>viser fokus reticle rundt elementteksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the last selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is the item with focus.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis siste valgt element i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er elementet med fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Although an item may be the one displaying the focus reticle, it may not actually be a selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Selv om et element som vises fokus reticle, kan ikke faktisk det valgte elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to obtain the selected items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, the FocusedItem property is not necessarily selected.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>Egenskaper for å få de valgte elementene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer FocusedItem egenskapen ikke er nødvendigvis er valgt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the FocusedItem property to determine which item was last clicked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, regardless of selection state.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen FocusedItem å finne ut hvilke elementet sist ble klikket i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll, uavhengig av utvalget tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the item that has focus, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item has the focus in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som representerer elementet med fokus, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ikke noe element har fokus den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som forgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking an item selects all its subitems.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om alle underelementer merkes Hvis du klikker et element.

trans-unit.source: The FullRowSelect property has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FullRowSelect har ingen virkning hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FullRowSelect property is typically used when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> displays items with many subitems and it is important to be able to see selected items when the item text is not visible due to horizontal scrolling of the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FullRowSelect er vanligvis brukes når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>viser elementer mange underelementene, og det er viktig å kunne se valgte elementer når elementteksten ikke vises på grunn av vannrett rulling av kontrollens innhold.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When FullRowSelect is set to `true`, ToolTips for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> will not be shown; only the ToolTip for the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når FullRowSelect er satt til `true`, verktøytips for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>vises ikke; bare verktøytipset for overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if clicking an item selects the item and all its subitems; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if clicking an item selects only the item itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du klikker et element velger elementet og alle tilhørende underelementer; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis merker bare selve elementet ved å klikke et element.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the item at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet i den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The GetItemAt method lets you determine which item is located at a specific location within the client region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetItemAt du kan angi hvilken element finnes på en bestemt plassering i klientområde for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method when the user clicks or right-clicks a subitem (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`) and you want to determine which item owns the subitem that was clicked based on the mouse coordinates at the time the user clicked the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden når brukeren klikker eller høyreklikker en subitem (når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til `View.Details`) og du vil finne ut hvilke elementet eier subitem som ble klikket basert på musen koordinatene når brukeren klikker musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> property value is `false`, this method returns an item only when the specified location is within the bounds of the parent item (which is displayed in the first column when the control is in details mode).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>egenskapsverdi `false`, denne metoden returnerer et element når den angitte plasseringen er utenfor grensene for det overordnede elementet (som vises i den første kolonnen når kontrollen er i modus for mer informasjon).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> property to `true` to retrieve an item with this method given a location within the bounds of a subitem.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>egenskapen `true` til å hente et element med denne metoden gitt en plassering i grensene for en subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> method to retrieve detailed information about the item at a particular location.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A>metode for å hente detaljert informasjon om elementet på en bestemt plassering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do drag-and-drop repositioning of items within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you might want to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method rather than the GetItemAt method.
trans-unit.target: Gjøre dra og slipp flytte elementer i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>enn metoden GetItemAt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden finner nærmest uansett hvor musepekeren er plassert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GetItemAt method, on the other hand, returns `null` if there is no item at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetItemAt returnerer på den andre siden `null` Hvis det er ingen elementer i den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> class is supported only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>klassen støttes bare for Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the location to search for an item (expressed in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten for plasseringen til å søke etter et element (uttrykt i klienten koordinater).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the location to search for an item (expressed in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten for plasseringen til å søke etter et element (uttrykt i klienten koordinater).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the item at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som representerer elementet fra den angitte posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: If there is no item at the specified location, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis finnes ikke noe element på den angitte plasseringen, returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounding rectangle for a specific item within the list view control.
trans-unit.target: Henter det avgrensende rektangelet for et spesifikt element i kontrollen for visningen.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle returned by this version of the GetItemRect method represents the entire item, including the icon, item text, and subitem text.
trans-unit.target: Det avgrensende rektangelet som returneres av denne versjonen av metoden GetItemRect representerer hele elementet, inkludert ikonet, Elementtekst og subitem tekst.

trans-unit.source: To specify a specific portion of the item's bounding rectangle, use the other version of the GetItemRect method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en bestemt del av elementet er markeringsramme rektanglet, kan du bruke den andre versjonen av metoden GetItemRect.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>der avgrensende rektangelet du vil returnere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer det avgrensende rektangelet for det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified portion of the bounding rectangle for a specific item within the list view control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den angitte delen av det avgrensende rektangelet for et spesifikt element i kontrollen for visningen.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle returned by this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A> method represents only the section of the item specified in the `portion` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Det avgrensende rektangelet som returneres av denne versjonen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>metoden representerer delen av element som er angitt i den `portion` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: To return the bounding rectangle of the entire item, use the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil tilbakestille det avgrensende rektangelet for hele elementet, kan du bruke versjonen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>der avgrensende rektangelet du vil returnere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion"></xref> values that represents a portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> for which to retrieve the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion"> </xref> verdier som representerer en del av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som du vil hente det avgrensende rektangelet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle for the specified portion of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer det avgrensende rektangelet for den angitte delen av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grid lines appear between the rows and columns containing the items and subitems in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rutenett vises mellom rader og kolonner som inneholder elementer og underelementer i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GridLines property has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen rutenettlinjene har ingen virkning hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GridLines property allows you to display lines to identify the rows and columns that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when it displays items and their subitems.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen rutenettlinjene kan du vise feltene for å identifisere rader og kolonner som vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer når du viser elementer og deres underelementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The grid lines that are displayed do not provide the ability to resize rows and columns as an application such as Microsoft Excel does.
trans-unit.target: Rutenett som vises gir muligheten til å endre størrelse på rader og kolonner som et program som Microsoft Excel samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: Only columns can be resized, if column headers are displayed, by moving the mouse pointer to the right side of the column to resize and then clicking and dragging until the column is the size you want.
trans-unit.target: Bare kolonner kan endres hvis kolonneoverskrifter vises, ved å flytte pekeren til høyre for kolonnen skal endre størrelse på og klikke og dra til kolonnen har ønsket størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The grid lines feature is used to provide the user of the control with visible boundaries around items and subitems.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen rutenett linjer brukes til å gi brukeren kontrollens synlige grensene rundt elementer og underelementer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grid lines are drawn around items and subitems; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rutenettlinjene tegnes rundt elementer og underelementer; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> objects assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> objekter som er tilordnet til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>grupperingsfunksjonen lar deg opprette visuelle grupper av logisk relaterte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Each group consists of a textual header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group.
trans-unit.target: Hver gruppe består av en tekstform etterfulgt av en vannrett linje og elementer som er tilordnet til denne gruppen.

trans-unit.source: You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan justere toppteksten til venstre, høyre, eller midten av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Any groups assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control appear whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Noen grupper som er tilordnet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll vises når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>grupper hjelper brukere Finn elementene de ser etter ved å skille elementene i nyttig kategorier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can create whatever categories you need.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette kategoriene må.

trans-unit.source: One typical approach is to group the items based on the way the list is sorted.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig fremgangsmåten er å gruppere elementer som er basert på hvordan listen er sortert.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when the list is sorted alphabetically or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel gruppere elementene etter den første bokstaven i elementet når listen er sortert alfabetisk eller underelementene som type eller dato når listen er sortert, ved å klikke en kolonneoverskrift i detaljvisningen.

trans-unit.source: Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping.
trans-unit.target: Windows Utforsker bruker denne typen gruppering.

trans-unit.source: To use the grouping feature, add one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> objects to the Groups collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke grupperingsfunksjonen, må du legge til én eller flere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>objekter i samlingen grupper i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: Set the group header text and header alignment in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.%23ctor%2A> constructor, or set them using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.HeaderAlignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Justere gruppen hodet tekst og topptekst den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren, eller angi dem ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.HeaderAlignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.HeaderAlignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To temporarily disable the grouping feature, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere grupperingsfunksjonen, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor, by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, or by directly adding the item to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of a group.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilordne et element i en gruppe ved å angi gruppen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren, ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen eller ved å legge til elementet som direkte i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling av en gruppe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Alle elementene skal tilordnes grupper før de vises.

trans-unit.source: Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}".
trans-unit.target: Alle elementer som ikke er tilordnet til en gruppe vises i standardgruppen som har hodet etiketten "DefaultGroup {0}".

trans-unit.source: The default group is not contained in the Groups collection, and cannot be altered.
trans-unit.target: Standardgruppen finnes ikke i samlingen grupper, og kan ikke endres.

trans-unit.source: It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups.
trans-unit.target: Det er primært nyttige ved feilsøking for å sikre at alle elementer har lagt riktig til grupper.

trans-unit.source: An item can only be in one group at a time.
trans-unit.target: Et element kan bare være én gruppe om gangen.

trans-unit.source: You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property at run time or by adding it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre gruppen som tilhører et element ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen ved kjøretid, eller ved å legge den til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling av en annen gruppe som automatisk fjernes fra den forrige gruppen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups.
trans-unit.target: Innsetting merke-funksjonen er deaktivert ved grupper.

trans-unit.source: This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that does not already order its items.
trans-unit.target: Fordi grupperingsfunksjonen sorterer elementer etter gruppemedlemskap, mens innsetting merke funksjonen som brukes med dra og slipp flytte i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll som ikke allerede sortere elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> groups are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>grupper er bare tilgjengelig på Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups has no effect and the groups will not appear.
trans-unit.target: Gruppene vises ikke på eldre operativsystemer kode knyttet til grupper har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet kanskje kode som er avhenger av Grupperingsfunksjonen fungerer ikke riktig.

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vil ta med koden som angir om grupperingsfunksjonen er tilgjengelig, og oppgi alternative funksjonalitet når den er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi alternativ sortering når du kjører på operativsystemene som ikke støtter sortering av gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The grouping feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: Grupperingsfunksjonen er angitt av samme bibliotek med funksjonen for oppsett av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Undersøk tilgjengeligheten av dette biblioteket ved kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>overlasten for metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref> that contains all the groups in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle gruppene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column header style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen for kolonne-hodet.

trans-unit.source: The HeaderStyle property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HeaderStyle kan du angi hvilken type kolonneoverskriftene skal vises når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll har <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objekter som er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects define the columns that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objekter Definer kolonnene som vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonne som brukes til å vise subitem informasjon for hvert element i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The HeaderStyle property allows you to specify whether the column headers are visible or, if they are visible, whether they will function as clickable buttons.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HeaderStyle kan du angi om kolonneoverskrifter er synlig, eller hvis de er synlig, om de fungerer som klikke knapper.

trans-unit.source: If the HeaderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the column headers are not displayed, although the items and subitems of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control are still arranged in columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen HeaderStyle er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, kolonneoverskriftene vises, selv om elementer og underelementer av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen fortsatt er ordnet i kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the HeaderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the column headers act like buttons that users can click to carry out an action, such as sorting the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using the items in the clicked column as a key.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen HeaderStyle er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, kolonneoverskriftene fungere som knapper som brukere kan klikke for å utføre en handling, for eksempel sortere elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere ved hjelp av elementene i kolonnen klikket som en nøkkel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can implement this behavior in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan implementere dette i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: If the HeaderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the column headers appear, but cannot be clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen HeaderStyle er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, kolonneoverskriftene vises, men ikke kan velges.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected item in the control remains highlighted when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det valgte elementet i kontrollen blir uthevet når kontrollen mister fokus.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color specified by the operating system when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `false`, valgte elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen være merket med en annen farge enn gjeldende utvalg fargen som angis av operativsystemet når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen mister fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen vil beholde elementer som er valgt av brukeren vises når brukeren klikker en annen kontroll i skjemaet eller flytter til et annet vindu.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the HideSelection property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du er bekymret med tilgjengeligheten av programmene, anbefales det at du definerer egenskapen HideSelection for `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selected item does not appear highlighted when the control loses focus; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the selected item still appears highlighted when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det valgte elementet ikke vises uthevet når kontrollen mister fokus. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis det valgte elementet vises fremdeles merkede når kontrollen mister fokus.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides item information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om, angitt et punkt.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a point is in an item or subitem and where in the item the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden for å finne ut om et punkt er i et element eller subitem og der i elementet punktet er plassert, for eksempel på etiketten eller image-området.
