trans-unit.source: If the coordinates are located outside the control, the returned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> object has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> property of "None"; and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> properties are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis koordinatene ligger utenfor kontrollen det returnerte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>objektet har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A>egenskapen "None"; og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A>egenskapene til `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> at which to retrieve the item information.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som ikke hente informasjon om elementet.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene er i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The item information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: Elementet informasjonen, et punkt.

trans-unit.source: The point contains coordinates that are less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Punktet inneholder koordinatene som er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Provides item information, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om, angitt x - og y-koordinatene.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a point is in an item or subitem, and where in the item the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å bestemme om et punkt er i et element eller subitem der i elementet punktet ligger, som på etiketten eller image-området.

trans-unit.source: If the coordinates are located outside the control, the returned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> object has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> property of "None"; and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> properties are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis koordinatene ligger utenfor kontrollen det returnerte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>objektet har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A>egenskapen "None"; og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A>egenskapene til `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate at which to retrieve the item information.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten som ikke hente informasjon om elementet.

trans-unit.source: The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Koordinaten som er knyttet til det øvre venstre hjørnet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate at which to retrieve the item information.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten som ikke hente informasjon om elementet.

trans-unit.source: The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Koordinaten som er knyttet til det øvre venstre hjørnet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The item information, given x- and y- coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Elementet informasjonen, x - og y-koordinatene.

trans-unit.source: The x- or y-coordinate is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: X - eller y-koordinaten er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text of an item or subitem has the appearance of a hyperlink when the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om teksten for et element eller subitem har utseendet til en hyperkobling når musepekeren sender over den.

trans-unit.source: Enabling hot tracking willcause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property to be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> andthe<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A> property to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer hot sporing willcause den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>og<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A> egenskapen settes til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, run-time label editing is not allowed when hot tracking is enabled.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kjøretid etiketten redigering er ikke tillatt når hot endringssporing er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item text has the appearance of a hyperlink when the mouse passes over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementteksten har utseendet til en hyperkobling når musen plasseres over den. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an item is automatically selected when the mouse pointer remains over the item for a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et element velges automatisk når musepekeren ligger over elementet noen sekunder.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the user can point to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to select the item.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, brukeren kan peke til et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen for å velge element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Multiple items can be selected (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to true) by holding down the CTRL key while pointing to each item.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge flere elementer (når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>-egenskap er satt til true) ved å holde nede CTRL-tasten mens peker på hvert element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide an easier method for the user of your application to select items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne funksjonen til å angi en enklere metode for brukeren av programmet for å velge elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an item is automatically selected when the mouse pointer hovers over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et element velges automatisk når musepekeren holdes over den. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object used to indicate the expected drop location when an item is dragged within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som brukes til å angi den forventede målplasseringen når du drar et element i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> insertion mark feature lets you visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>innsetting merke-funksjonen kan du angi den forventede målplasseringen i dra og slipp visuelt når et element drar til en ny plassering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A> property is set to `true` and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not sort the items automatically.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen fungerer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A>er satt til `true` og når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen sorteres ikke elementene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent automatic sorting, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Å hindre automatisk sortering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the insertion mark feature may not be visible with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg funksjonen innsetting merke vises kanskje ikke med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>gruppering funksjonen fordi grupperingsfunksjonen sorterer elementer etter gruppemedlemskap.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> class is typically used in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>klassen brukes vanligvis i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>-hendelsen for å oppdatere posisjonen for innsetting-merking som et element drar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>

trans-unit.source: It is also used in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> event to insert a dragged item at the correct location.
trans-unit.target: Det er også brukes i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>-hendelsen for å sette inn et dratt element på den riktige plasseringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> and [How to: Display an Insertion Mark in a Windows Forms ListView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>og [slik: Vis en innsettingsmerke i en Windows Forms-kontroll for listevisningen blir](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innsetting merke funksjonen er bare tilgjengelig på Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark has no effect and the insertion mark will not appear.
trans-unit.target: Innsettingsmerke vises ikke på eldre operativsystemer kode gjelder innsettingsmerke har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet kanskje kode som er avhenger av innsetting merke-funksjonen fungerer ikke riktig.

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether this feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vil ta med koden som angir om denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig, og oppgi alternative funksjonalitet når den er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel omgå all kode som implementerer dra og slipp elementet plasseringen endres når du kjører på operativsystemene som ikke støtter innsetting for.

trans-unit.source: > > The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: >> Innsetting merke funksjonen er angitt av samme bibliotek med funksjonen for oppsett av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Undersøk tilgjengeligheten av dette biblioteket ved kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>overlasten for metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark"></xref> object representing the insertion mark.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark"> </xref> -objekt som representerer innsettingsmerke.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata- eller en bestemt nøkkel som krever forhåndsbehandling.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is activated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et element er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The ItemActivate event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemActivate hendelsen oppstår når brukeren aktiverer én eller flere elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property, or with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan aktivere et element med et enkelt museklikk eller dobbeltklikk, avhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>-egenskapen, eller med tastaturet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: From within the event handler for the ItemActivate event, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to access the collection of items selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to determine which items are being activated.
trans-unit.target: Fra i hendelsesbehandlingen for hendelsen ItemActivate, kan du sjekke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>Egenskaper for å få tilgang til samlingen av elementer som er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>å finne ut hvilke elementer aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the check state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontroller tilstanden til et element endres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property must be set to true in order for check boxes to be displayed next to each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>egenskapen må være satt til true for at avmerkingsboksene som skal vises ved siden av hvert element i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ItemCheck event occurs when the check state of an item changes or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ItemCheck-hendelsen oppstår når kontroller tilstanden til et element endres, eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the ItemCheck event to perform tasks such as changing the state of an item's icon or another application-specific task each time an item is checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for ItemCheck-hendelsen for å utføre oppgaver som endret status for et element ikonet eller en annen aktivitet som programspesifikk hver gang en elementet er sjekket inn av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the window handle has not been created when the ItemCheck event is raised, the event will be delayed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis vindusreferansen ikke er opprettet når ItemCheck denne hendelsen oppstår, hendelsen vil bli forsinket.

trans-unit.source: Once the window handle is created (when the form is shown), any delayed ItemCheck events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Når vindusreferansen er opprettet (skjemaet vises), forsinket ItemCheck hendelser var årsaken.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når endres status til et element.

trans-unit.source: This event is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event, but is raised after the item has been checked.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>hendelse, men oppstår etter at elementet er sjekket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren starter dra et element.

trans-unit.source: The ItemDrag event occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: ItemDrag-hendelsen oppstår når brukeren starter dra et element.

trans-unit.source: Typically the event handler for the ItemDrag event performs the task of dragging by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis hendelsesbehandlingen for hendelsen ItemDrag utfører arbeidsoppgaven for dra ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å utføre oppgaver som er nødvendig for å dra elementer inn og ut av programmets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse hovers over an item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når markøren er over et element.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing all items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder alle elementer i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> returned by this property, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of items.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>returneres av denne egenskapen, du kan legge til elementer, Fjern elementene, og få et antall elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om oppgavene som kan utføres med elementene i samlingen, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>klasse referanse emner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> that contains all the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>som inneholder alle elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selection state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når valgtilstanden av et element endres.

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged> event will occur when the selection state of multiple items changes.
trans-unit.target: I virtuelle modus i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>hendelsen skal skje når valgtilstanden av flere elementer endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ItemSelectionChanged event occurs whether the item state changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: Den ItemSelectionChanged inntreffer om tilstanden elementet endres fra valgte er deaktivert eller ikke er valgt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the labels of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan redigere etikettene for elementene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the LabelEdit property is set to `true`, the user is able to modify the text of an item by clicking the item text to select it and then clicking the item text again to put the label text into edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Når LabelEdit-egenskapen er satt til `true`brukeren kan endre teksten for et element ved å klikke elementteksten for å velge den og deretter klikke elementteksten på nytt for å sette etiketteksten i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The user can then modify or replace the item's text label.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan deretter endre eller erstatte tekstetiketten for elementet.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> events to perform tasks before and after the user edits an item's text.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit>hendelser til å utføre oppgaver før og etter at brukeren redigerer teksten for et element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>

trans-unit.source: The text of subitems cannot be modified if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for underelementene kan ikke endres hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`.

trans-unit.source: To change the text of subitems, you can display a dialog box to users when they double-click a subitem in the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre teksten underelementer, kan du vise en dialogboks til brukere når de dobbeltklikker subitem i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the LabelEdit property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, etiketten redigering tillates ikke uavhengig av verdien for egenskapen LabelEdit.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can edit the labels of items at run time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren kan redigere etikettene for elementene på kjøretidspunktet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether item labels wrap when items are displayed in the control as icons.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om elementetiketter brytes når det blir vist i kontrollen som ikoner.

trans-unit.source: When the LabelWrap property is set to `true`, the item text is wrapped to the next line of text if needed.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen LabelWrap er satt til `true`, elementteksten brytes til neste tekstlinje om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: If the text is longer than two lines of text, the text is shortened.
trans-unit.target: Hvis teksten er lengre enn to linjer med tekst, forkortet teksten.

trans-unit.source: If the user selects the item, all the item text is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren velger elementet, vises all Elementtekst.

trans-unit.source: If the LabelWrap property is set to `false`, all item text is displayed on a single line.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen LabelWrap er satt til `false`, all Elementtekst vises på hver linje.

trans-unit.source: The entire item text is displayed when the LabelWrap is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for hele elementet vises når LabelWrap er satt til `false`.

trans-unit.source: This property is only used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er bare brukes når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if item labels wrap when items are displayed as icons; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementetiketter bryte når elementer vises som ikoner. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> to use when displaying items as large icons in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> skal brukes ved visning av elementer som store ikoner i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The LargeImageList property allows you to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> object that contains icons to use when displaying items with large icons (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LargeImageList kan du angi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objekt som inneholder ikonene skal brukes ved visning av elementer med store ikoner (når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can accept any graphics format that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control supports when displaying icons.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen godtar eventuelle grafikk formater som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>kontrollen støtter når du viser ikoner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is not limited to .ico files.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er ikke begrenset til *.ico filer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Once an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is assigned to the LargeImageList property, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to the index position of the appropriate image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>er tilordnet til egenskapen LargeImageList, kan du angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapen for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen indeksen posisjonen for det aktuelle bildet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The size of the icons for the LargeImageList is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på ikonene for LargeImageList er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because only one index can be specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the LargeImageList and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties should have the same index positions for the images to display.
trans-unit.target: Fordi bare én indeksen kan angis for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objekter som angis i LargeImageList og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>Egenskaper må ha samme indeksen posisjoner for bilder skal vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the LargeImageList and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>er satt til 0, bilder skal brukes for både små og store ikonene må være i samme posisjon for indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objekter som angis i LargeImageList og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når bildene er angitt med nøkler, må du likevel stedet små og store versjoner av bildet til den samme indeksen i de respektive bildet listene.

trans-unit.source: When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified.
trans-unit.target: Når veksle mellom visninger, hvor indeksen for bildet i én liste til å finne bildet i andre listen, uavhengig av nøkkelverdien som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to use when displaying items with small icons (all view modes other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>skal brukes ved visning av elementer med små ikoner (alle vise modi enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>), brukes den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: If you want to use images to display item state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke bilder viser elementet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the icons to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> som inneholder ikonene skal brukes når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sorting comparer for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sortering Sammenligningsfunksjonen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ListViewItemSorter property allows you to specify the object that performs the sorting of items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called or when items are added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ListViewItemSorter kan du angi objektet som utfører sorteringen av elementene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>-metoden eller når elementer legges til i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Note that items are not sorted automatically when their label text changes.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at elementer ikke er sortert automatisk når endres til teksten.

trans-unit.source: The specified object must be an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface, which has a single method called <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte objektet må være en forekomst av en klasse som implementerer <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>grensesnittet, som har en enkelt metode kalt <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide custom sorting, for example, when a column header is clicked in the details view.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å angi egendefinert sortering, for eksempel når en kolonneoverskrift klikkes i detaljvisningen.

trans-unit.source: To do this, create a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and provides a constructor that accepts the index of a column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, oppretter du en klasse som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>grensesnittet og gir en konstruktør som godtar indeksen for en kolonne du vil sortere etter.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: You can then implement a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event that creates an instance of this class using the index of the clicked column.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter implementere et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>hendelsen som oppretter en forekomst av denne klassen med indeksen for kolonnen klikket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: When you set the ListViewItemSorter property to the new instance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is automatically sorted using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir ListViewItemSorter-egenskapen til den nye forekomsten av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen sorteres automatisk ved hjelp av det angitte objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method use the same object.
trans-unit.target: Etterfølgende kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>metode bruke det samme objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the value of the ListViewItemSorter property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called automatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du angir verdien for egenskapen ListViewItemSorter i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>-metoden automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> that represents the sorting comparer for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>som representerer den sortering Sammenligningsfunksjonen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om flere elementer kan velges.

trans-unit.source: When the MultiSelect property is set to `true`, multiple items can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen MultiSelect er satt til `true`, kan velge flere elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To select multiple items, the user must hold down the CTRL key while clicking the items to select.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge flere elementer, må brukeren holder du nede CTRL-tasten ved å klikke elementene for å merke.

trans-unit.source: Consecutive items can be selected by clicking the first item to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last item to select.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge flere elementer ved å klikke det første elementet til å velge og deretter mens du holder du nede SKIFT, klikker du det siste elementet til å velge.

trans-unit.source: You can use the multiple selection feature to select multiple items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and perform an operation on all the items selected.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke funksjonen for flere merkede området til å velge flere elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere og utfører en operasjon på alle de valgte elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple items and then right-click a selected item to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks that can be performed on the selected items.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan for eksempel velge flere elementer og høyreklikk et merket element for å vise en hurtigmeny som viser et sett med oppgaver som kan utføres på de valgte elementene.

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut hvilke elementer som er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property allows you to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> that contains a list of the selected items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>egenskapen får du tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>som inneholder en liste over de valgte elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the index positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> instead of the items, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil indeksen posisjonen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>i stedet for elementene du kan bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>til å få tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to allow multiple selections in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, yet still want to offer the user a way for multiple items to be chosen, you can display check boxes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke vil tillate at flere merkes i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, ennå fremdeles vil gi brukeren en metode for flere elementer som skal velges, kan du vise avmerkingsboksene ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items in the control can be selected at one time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis flere elementer i kontrollen kan velge om gangen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen tegnes operativsystemet eller kode du oppgir.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is normally drawn by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen tegnes vanligvis av operativsystemet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In order to customize the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items, subitems, and column headers, set the OwnerDraw property to `true` and provide a handler for one or more of the following events: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: For å tilpasse utseendet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementer, underelementene og kolonneoverskrifter, angi OwnerDraw egenskapen `true` og gi et behandlingsprogram for én eller flere av følgende hendelser: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This is called owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Dette kalles eieren tegning.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, all three events occur; otherwise, only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, alle tre hendelser inntreffer; ellers bare den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>inntreffer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Subitem informasjon vanligvis vises i side ved side-visningen som detaljene vise, men side ved side-visningen, må den tegnes i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event does not occur for any subitems for which no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object has been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>hendelsen oppstår ikke for alle underelementene for som Nei <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objektet har blitt lagt til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the first subitem of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den første subitem for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objektet representerer det overordnede elementet og vises i den første kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: I visningen for mer informasjon, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>-hendelsen for å tegne elementer vanlige til alle underelementer, for eksempel bakgrunnen, og behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>-hendelsen for å tegne elementer for individuelle underelementene, for eksempel tekstverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tegne alle elementer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere med bare én av de to hendelsene, selv om dette kan være like praktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: For å tegne kolonneoverskriftene i detaljvisningen, må du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Å unngå problemer med grafikk flimring overstyres tegning er eieren av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> tegnes kontroll av kode du oppgir; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> tegnes kontroll av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: Forces a range of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger en rekke <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> objektene som skal tegnes på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The RedrawItems method can be used whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode or regular mode.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RedrawItems kan være brukes om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>er i virtuelle eller vanlige modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method has been called prior to the call to RedrawItems, the redraw will not occur.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>metoden kalles før kallet til RedrawItems, gjennomføres ikke i tilbaketrekking.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index for the first item in the range to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for det første elementet i området til er trukket tilbake.

trans-unit.source: The index for the last item of the range to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for det siste elementet for området som skal tegnes på nytt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to invalidate the range of items; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to invalidate and repaint the items.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å oppheve området med elementer. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> gjøre for å oppdatere elementene.

trans-unit.source: startIndex or endIndex is less than 0, greater than or equal to the number of items in the or, if in virtual mode, greater than the value of .
trans-unit.target: startIndexeller endIndex er mindre enn 0, større enn eller lik antallet elementer i den eller, hvis virtuelle brukes, større enn verdien for .

trans-unit.source: -or- The given startIndex is greater than the endIndex.
trans-unit.target: - eller - den angitte startIndex er større enn denendIndex.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and requires a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> er i modus for virtuelle og krever en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object is in virtual mode, it creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects dynamically instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>objektet er i virtuelle modus, opprettes det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objekter dynamisk i stedet for å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the object must create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når objektet må opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event should create the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> or retrieve it from the cache, and pass it back by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen må opprette riktig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>eller hente det fra hurtigbufferen, og sende den igjen ved way av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen er ordnet fra høyre mot venstre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> property is for use with international applications where the language is read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>egenskapen er kun til bruk med internasjonale programmer der språket leses fra høyre mot venstre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> to true the control's contents and text will be laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>til SANN kontrollens innholdet og teksten skal plasseres fra høyre mot venstre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control is laid out from right to left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen er ordnet fra høyre mot venstre; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
