trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a scroll bar is added to the control when there is not enough room to display all items.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en rullefeltet legges til kontrollen når det ikke er nok plass til å vise alle elementene.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> displays a vertical scroll bar to use when the number of items exceeds the size of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>viser en loddrette rullefeltet skal brukes når antall elementer overskrider størrelsen på klienten for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that the user can access all items that are available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen for å sikre at brukeren har tilgang til alle elementer som er tilgjengelige i det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0, the column headers were not painted correctly when setting this property to `false` and resizing the control to make it larger.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I versjoner av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] før versjon 2.0, kolonneoverskriftene var ikke malt riktig når du angir denne egenskapen `false` og endre størrelsen på kontrollen for å gjøre den større.

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, set this property to `true` in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event handler and set it back to `false` in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Du kan løse dette problemet ved å angi denne egenskapen `true` i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>hendelsesbehandlingen og sett tilbake `false` i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if scroll bars are added to the control when necessary to allow the user to see all the items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis side-felt som er lagt til i kontrollen når det er nødvendig for å tillate at brukere skal se alle elementene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and a search is taking place.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> er i modus for virtuelle og et søk tar sted.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>er i modus for virtuelle og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property matches the search criteria and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Under behandling av denne hendelsen, må du beregne som elementet fra listen over elementer som er angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>egenskapen samsvarer med søkekriteriene og Still inn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen indeksen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an item is not provided, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et element ikke er angitt, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>tilbakestiller `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices*> collection changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices*>samlingen endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> collection changes whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>samlingen endres når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property change can occur programmatically or when the user selects an item or clears the selection of an item.
trans-unit.target: Endring av egenskapen kan oppstå programmatisk eller når brukeren velger et element eller fjerner valg av et element.

trans-unit.source: When the user selects an item without pressing CTRL to perform a multiple selection, the control first clears the previous selection.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren velger et element uten å trykke CTRL til å utføre en flervalg, fjerner kontrollen først forrige valg.

trans-unit.source: In this case, this event occurs one time for each item that was previously selected and one time for the newly selected item.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår i så fall én gang for hvert element som ble valgt tidligere og én gang for nylig merkede elementet.

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Til å fastslå hvilke elementer som er valgt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>egenskapen for å få tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to perform tasks whenever there is a change to the selected items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for denne hendelsen til å utføre oppgaver når det er en endring i de valgte elementene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the indexes of the selected items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksene i de valgte elementene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndices property will not contain any indexes if the property is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> handle is created, which typically occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is initially loaded for display in the form.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedIndices ikke inneholder noen indekser hvis egenskapen er åpnet før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>referansen er opprettet, som oppstår vanligvis når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>lastes opprinnelig skal vises i skjemaet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the handle is created with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere om referansen er opprettet med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`, this property returns a collection containing the indexes of all items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>er satt til `true`, denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder indeksene i alle elementer som er valgt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: For en enkel merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder ett enkelt element som inneholder indeksen for bare valgte elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om oppgavene som kan utføres med elementene i samlingen, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the index positions of the items that are selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente en samling av elementene som er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen i stedet for indeksen posisjoner for elementer som er valgt, brukes den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> that contains the indexes of the selected items.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>som inneholder indeksene i de valgte elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently selected, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen elementer er valgt, et tomt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the items that are selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementer som er valgt i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedItems property will not contain any items if the property is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> handle is created, which typically occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is initially loaded for display in the form.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedItems ikke inneholder noen elementer hvis egenskapen er åpnet før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>referansen er opprettet, som oppstår vanligvis når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>lastes opprinnelig skal vises i skjemaet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the handle is created with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere om referansen er opprettet med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`, this property returns a collection containing the items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>er satt til `true`, denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder elementer som er valgt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, this property returns a collection containing the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: For en enkel merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder bare valgte elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om oppgavene som kan utføres med elementene i samlingen, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the index positions within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of the items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the items that are selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente en samling av posisjonene indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>elementer som er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen i stedet for elementer som er valgt, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> that contains the items that are selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>som inneholder elementer som er valgt i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently selected, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen elementer er valgt, et tomt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items are displayed in groups.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om blir vist i grupper.

trans-unit.source: Any groups assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control appear whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Noen grupper som er tilordnet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll vises når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>grupperingsfunksjonen lar deg opprette visuelle grupper av logisk relaterte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementer på Windows XP og Windows Server 2003.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To enable this feature, your application must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må kalle du aktiverer denne funksjonen, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display items in groups; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>elementene skal vises i grupper. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verktøytips skal vises den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> objekter i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the ShowItemToolTips property is set to `true`, any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> that has a ToolTip will display it; otherwise, nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ShowItemToolTips er satt til `true`, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>som har et verktøytips vil vise den; ellers ingenting vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> ToolTips should be shown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> verktøytips skal vises; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> to use when displaying items as small icons in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> skal brukes ved visning av elementer som små ikoner i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SmallImageList property allows you to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> object that contains icons to use when displaying items with small icons (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to any value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SmallImageList kan du angi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objekt som inneholder ikonene skal brukes ved visning av elementer med små ikoner (når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>settes til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can accept any graphics format that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control supports when displaying icons.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen godtar eventuelle grafikk formater som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>kontrollen støtter når du viser ikoner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is not limited to .ico files.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen er ikke begrenset til *.ico filer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Once an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is assigned to the SmallImageList property, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to the index position of the appropriate image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>er tilordnet til egenskapen SmallImageList, kan du angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapen for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen indeksen posisjonen for det aktuelle bildet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The size of the icons for the SmallImageList is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på ikonene for SmallImageList er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because only one index can be specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and SmallImageList properties should have the same index positions for the images to display.
trans-unit.target: Fordi bare én indeksen kan angis for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objekter som angis i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>og SmallImageList egenskaper må ha samme indeksen posisjoner for bilder skal vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and SmallImageList properties.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>er satt til 0, bilder skal brukes for både små og store ikonene må være i samme posisjon for indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objekter som angis i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>og SmallImageList egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når bildene er angitt med nøkler, må du likevel stedet små og store versjoner av bildet til den samme indeksen i de respektive bildet listene.

trans-unit.source: When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified.
trans-unit.target: Når veksle mellom visninger, hvor indeksen for bildet i én liste til å finne bildet i andre listen, uavhengig av nøkkelverdien som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to use when displaying items with large icons (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>skal brukes ved visning av elementer med store ikoner (når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>), bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: If you want to use images to display item state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke bilder viser elementet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the icons to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> som inneholder ikonene skal brukes når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items of the list view.
trans-unit.target: Sorterer elementene i listen.

trans-unit.source: Typically items are sorted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A> property, which sorts items based on the item text.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis elementer sorteres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>egenskapen som sorterer elementer som er basert på elementteksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the sort order, you must write a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property to an object of that class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse sorteringsrekkefølgen, må du skrive en klasse som implementerer i <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>grensesnittet og angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>egenskapen til et objekt av denne klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to sort items by subitem text.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig, for eksempel når du vil sortere etter subitem tekst.

trans-unit.source: For more information on performing manual sorting of items, see the example for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du utfører manuell sorteringen av elementer, kan du se eksempel for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> or if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items are added.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>settes til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>eller hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>er satt, listen er sortert automatisk når elementer legges.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.
trans-unit.target: Elementer sorteres ikke automatisk når etiketteksten endres.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sort order for items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sorteringsrekkefølgen for elementer i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Sorting property allows you to specify whether or not items are sorted in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen sortering kan du angi om elementer er sortert i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: By default, no sorting is performed.
trans-unit.target: Som standard utføres ingen sortering.

trans-unit.source: When the Sorting property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>, the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> are sorted automatically in ascending alphabetical order (when the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>) or descending alphabetical order (when the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>).
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen sortering er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>, elementene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>automatisk er sortert i stigende alfabetisk (når egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>) eller synkende rekkefølge (når egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to automatically sort items that are displayed in your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to make it easier for users to find items when a large number of items are available.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å sortere automatisk elementer som skal vises i din <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll å gjøre det enklere for brukerne å finne elementer når et stort antall elementer som er tilgjengelige.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform your own item sorting instead of using the Sorting property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utføre din egen elementet sortering i stedet for å bruke egenskapen sortering, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>egenskapen sammen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Sorting property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> or if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items is added.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen sortering er satt til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>eller hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>er satt, listen er sortert automatisk når elementer er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.
trans-unit.target: Elementer sorteres ikke automatisk når etiketteksten endres.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> associated with application-defined states in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> tilknyttet Programdefinert tilstander i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The StateImageList property allows you to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that contains images to use to represent an application-specific state of an item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StateImageList kan du angi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>som inneholder bilder som skal brukes til å representere en programspesifikk status for et element i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: State images are displayed to the left of an icon for the item.
trans-unit.target: Tilstand bilder vises til venstre for et ikon for elementet.

trans-unit.source: You can use state images, such as checked and unchecked check boxes, to indicate application-defined item states.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke tilstand bilder, for eksempel merket avmerkede og ukontrollert som viser Programdefinert elementet tilstander.

trans-unit.source: State images are visible in all views of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Tilstand bilder vises i alle listevisninger den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is specified in the StateImageList property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> are displayed instead of the check box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>er angitt i egenskapen StateImageList og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>er satt til `true`, bilder ved indeks posisjoner 0 og 1 i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>vises i stedet for i avmerkingsboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.
trans-unit.target: Bildet i indeksen posisjon 0 vises i stedet for merket for ukontrollert, og bildet i indeksen posisjon 1 vises i stedet for de avmerkede merkingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains a set of state images that can be used to indicate an application-defined state of an item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> som inneholder et sett med tilstanden bilder som kan brukes til å angi en Programdefinert status for et element.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Text*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the tiles shown in tile view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på flisene vises i side ved side-visningen.

trans-unit.source: This property controls the size of tiles when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kontrollerer størrelsen på kartdeler når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long to be displayed on a single line.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen er nyttig for å hindre linje wrapping når subitem teksten er for lang. som skal vises på hver linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new tile size.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som inneholder den nye flisstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first visible item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det første synlige elementet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the item with the index position of zero (0) is at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: I utgangspunktet element med index-posisjonen for null (0) er på toppen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control contents are scrolled, a different item can be at the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen innholdet er rullet kan være et annet element på toppen av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate or determine which item is visible at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å angi eller fastslå hvilke elementet vises øverst i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The value of the TopItem property will not always persist, depending on where the desired top item is in the list view.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen TopItem vil ikke alltid beholde, avhengig av hvor det ønskede øverste elementet er i listen.

trans-unit.source: The number of items visible in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control at any time depends on the height of the list view and the size of the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer som vises i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen når som helst avhenger høyden på listevisningen og størrelsen på elementene den inneholder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the items exceed the height of the list view, the items will continue onto multiple pages, which the user can scroll through.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementene overskrider høyden på listevisningen, fortsetter elementene over flere sider som brukeren kan bla gjennom.

trans-unit.source: If you set the TopItem property to an item in the last page of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the item will automatically be scrolled into view; however, TopItem will be set to the actual top item of the last page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter TopItem-egenskapen til et element i den siste siden i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, vil automatisk rullet elementet til visningen; imidlertid TopItem settes til faktiske øverste element av den siste siden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that a specific item is in the visible region of the control (but not necessarily in the top position), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Slik at et spesifikt element blir i synlige området kontrollens (men ikke nødvendigvis i øverste posisjon), bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property has no effect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Scrollable%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sette denne egenskapen har ingen effekt når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Scrollable%2A>egenskapsverdi `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Scrollable%2A>

trans-unit.source: > > Setting this property is not supported in versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: >> Når egenskapen settes støttes ikke i versjoner av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] før versjon 2.0.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the first visible item in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som representerer det første synlige elementet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A string that states the control type, the count of items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control, and the type of the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>, if the count is not 0.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir kontrollen skriver, antall elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollerer, og typen for det første elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>, hvis antallet er 0.

trans-unit.source: Updates the extended styles applied to the list view control.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer de utvidede stilene kontrollen for visningen.

trans-unit.source: You can use the UpdateExtendedStyles method in your derived class to override the extended styles used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke UpdateExtendedStyles-metoden i den utledede klassen for å overstyre utvidede stiler brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you call this method, you should ensure that the extended styles set by properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control are utilized in your derived version of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kalle denne metoden, bør du kontrollere at de utvidede stilene angitt av egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen brukes i avledede versjon kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The following are the properties that apply an extended style to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er egenskaper som gjelder en utvidet stil for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> uses state image behavior that is compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 or the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> bruker tilstand bildet virkemåte som er kompatibel med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 eller [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 enable custom state images to be set to indicate whether an item is checked or unchecked or in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 Aktiver egendefinerte tilstand bilder er satt til å angi om et element er merket eller umerket eller ubestemt tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: With the addition of this feature, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 has different behavior than the .NET Framework 1.1.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til denne funksjonen i [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 har ulike virkemåter enn .NET Framework 1.1.

trans-unit.source: If you have created applications that depend on the behavior in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, be sure that the UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior property is set to `true`, which is the default value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har opprettet programmer som er avhengige av virkemåten i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, må du kontrollere at egenskapen UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior er satt `true`, som er standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: In order to fully take advantage of custom state images, set UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior to `false`.
trans-unit.target: For å fullstendig dra nytte av egendefinerte tilstand bilder, WantDestinationQueue UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior `false`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] designer, the UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior property will be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du bruker den [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] designer, UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior egenskapen settes til `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state image behavior is compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the behavior is compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilstanden bildet virkemåten er kompatibel med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis virkemåten er kompatibel med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how items are displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvordan elementer vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The View property allows you to specify the type of display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control uses to display items.
trans-unit.target: Vis-egenskapen kan du angi hvilken type visning av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen bruker til å vise elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can set the View property to display each item with large or small icons or display items in a vertical list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen visningen til å vise hvert element med store eller små ikoner eller vise elementer i en loddrett liste.

trans-unit.source: The richest option is the details view, which allows you to view not only the items but any subitems specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: Alternativet rikeste er detaljvisningen, slik at du kan vise ikke bare elementer, men underelementene som er angitt for hvert element.

trans-unit.source: Each item is displayed in a grid, with each item listed vertically and the subitems for each item displayed in a column, with column headers.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element vises i et rutenett med hvert element som er oppført loddrett og subitems for hvert element vises i en kolonne med kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: The details view is a perfect way to display database information to a user.
trans-unit.target: Detaljvisningen er en perfekt måte å vise databaseinformasjon til en bruker.

trans-unit.source: With Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, you can also display items as tiles that balance graphical and textual information by showing a large icon along with subitem information of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: Med Windows XP og Windows Server 2003, kan du vise elementer som fliser som saldo for grafisk og tekstbaserte ved å vise et stort ikon sammen med subitem informasjon velger.

trans-unit.source: To enable tile view, your application must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere side ved side-visningen programmet må kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The small-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information to the right of the icon.
trans-unit.target: Visningen liten bildet viser hvert element med et ikon og informasjon til høyre for ikonet.

trans-unit.source: The large-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information below the icon.
trans-unit.target: Visningen store bildet viser hvert element med et ikon og informasjon under ikonet.

trans-unit.source: The size of the icons for the image list is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på ikonene for bildelisten er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using multiple image lists, for small and large icon view, with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you should place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du bruker flere bilde-lister for visning av små og store ikoner, med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll, bør du sette små og store versjoner av avbildningen på den samme indeksen plassering i de respektive bildet listene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified.
trans-unit.target: Når veksle mellom visninger, hvor indeksen for bildet i én liste til å finne bildet i andre listen, uavhengig av nøkkelverdien som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Most of the properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control affect how the different views behave or are displayed.
trans-unit.target: De fleste av egenskapene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen påvirker hvordan de ulike visningene dine eller vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Some properties that affect the views of the items are only useful when the View property is set to a specific value, while others are useful in all views.
trans-unit.target: Noen egenskaper som påvirker visninger av elementene fungerer bare når egenskapen visningen er satt til en bestemt verdi, mens andre er nyttig når alle visninger.

trans-unit.source: For example, properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> are only useful when the View property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> properties are useful in all views.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel egenskaper som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>fungerer bare når egenskapen visningen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, mens den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>er nyttig når alle visninger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser noen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>medlemmer og visningene de er gyldig i.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the View property is often set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel egenskapen visningen ofte er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>fordi detaljvisningen inneholder en rekke visningsalternativer er ikke tilgjengelig i de andre visningene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the View property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any items.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis din <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen ikke har noen kolonneoverskrifter som er angitt, og du angir View-egenskapen til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen vises ikke alle elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the View property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any subitems.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen ikke har noen kolonneoverskrifter som er angitt, og du angir View-egenskapen til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen vises ikke alle underelementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right.
trans-unit.target: Side ved side-visningen viser hvert element med et stort ikon på venstre og tekstbaserte informasjonen til høyre.

trans-unit.source: The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems.
trans-unit.target: Samme består av elementetiketten etterfulgt av underelementene.

trans-unit.source: By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises bare den første subitem som tilsvarer elementetiketten.

trans-unit.source: To display additional subitems, you must add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: For å vise flere underelementene, må du legge til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objekter til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header.
trans-unit.target: Hver subitem i flisen tilsvarer en kolonneoverskrift.

trans-unit.source: To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for each item and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for each header.
trans-unit.target: For å styre hvilke underelementene vises og rekkefølgen de vises, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for hvert element og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen for hver topptekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection to achieve the desired result.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter legge til, fjerne og omorganisere meldingshoder i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>samlingen for det ønskede resultatet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å styre størrelsen på flisene i visningen side ved side, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for å hindre linje wrapping når subitem er for lang for en enkelt linje.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the tile view, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på side ved side-visningen, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om kolonner vises bare i detaljvisningen, vises ikke underelementene uten kolonneoverskriftene i detaljvisningen eller side ved side-visningen.

trans-unit.source: The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Side ved side-visningen er bare tilgjengelig på Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control displays in the large icon view.
trans-unit.target: Kode relatert til side ved side-visningen har ingen innvirkning på eldre operativsystemer, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen vises i stort ikon.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet kanskje kode som er avhenger av side ved side-visningen fungerer ikke riktig.

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vil ta med koden som angir om side ved side-visningen er tilgjengelig, og oppgi alternative funksjonalitet når den er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når du bruker eieren tegning for å tilpasse utseendet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementer i visningen side ved side, bør du bruke tegning koden passende å store ikoner-visningen når du kjører på operativsystemer som ikke støtter side ved side-visningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen for side ved side-visningen er angitt av samme bibliotek med funksjonen for oppsett av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Undersøk tilgjengeligheten av dette biblioteket ved kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>overlasten for metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and the selection state of a range of items has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> er i virtuelle modus og utvalget tilstanden for en rekke elementer er endret.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is not in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>er ikke i virtuelle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>hendelsen skjer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the list when in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> objekter i listen i virtuelle modus.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting the VirtualListSize property when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> set to `false` will have no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapen VirtualListSize når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>satt til `false` har ingen innvirkning på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> is set to `true`, and the VirtualListSize property is greater than 0, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event, providing a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>er satt til `true`, og egenskapen VirtualListSize er større enn 0, må du behandle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>hendelsen gir en gyldig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> when in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Antall <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> objekter i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> når i virtuelle modus.

trans-unit.source: VirtualListSize is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: VirtualListSize er satt til en verdi mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, VirtualListSize is greater than 0, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> is not handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, VirtualListSize er større enn 0, og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"> </xref> behandles ikke.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du har angitt dine egne data styring for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Setting the VirtualMode property to `true` puts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> into virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen VirtualMode til `true` setter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>til virtuelle modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In Virtual mode, the normal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection is unused.
trans-unit.target: Modusen virtuelle, vanlige <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>samlingen er ubrukt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects are created dynamically as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> requires them.
trans-unit.target: I stedet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objekter opprettes dynamisk som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>krever dem..</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Virtuell modus kan være nyttig i mange tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object for each entry can be wasteful.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>objektet må fylles ut fra en svært samling allerede i minnet, oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objekt for hver oppføring kan være wasteful.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, only the items required are created.
trans-unit.target: Bare elementer kreves opprettes i virtuelle modus.

trans-unit.source: In other cases, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance.
trans-unit.target: I andre tilfeller verdiene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objekter må kanskje beregnes ofte og gjøre dette for hele samlingen vil generere uakseptabel ytelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated.
trans-unit.target: De obligatoriske elementene beregnes virtuelle modus.

trans-unit.source: In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event, which is raised every time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> requires an item.
trans-unit.target: For å bruke virtuelle modus, må du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>som oppstår hver gang de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>krever et element.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: This event handler should create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object that belongs at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsesbehandlingen må opprette den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objekt som tilhører i den angitte indeksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A> property must be set to the size of the virtual list.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A>egenskapen må være satt til størrelsen på liste over virtuelle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event enables searching in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>hendelsen aktiverer søk i virtuelle modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: If this event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> methods will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne hendelsen ikke behandles, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>metoder tilbakestiller `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event in order to maintain a cache of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>hendelsen for å kunne beholde en hurtigbuffer med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>

trans-unit.source: If the calculation or lookup to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis beregning eller lookup til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objektet er kostbar opprettholder en hurtigbuffer kan forbedre ytelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, the value will automatically be changed to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> when VirtualMode is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, verdien vil automatisk bli endret til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>når VirtualMode er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: I virtuelle modus i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>samlingen er deaktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to access it results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å få tilgang til fører <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The same is true of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Det samme gjelder for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>samlingen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> collections instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente valgte eller avmerkede elementer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>samlinger i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>
